todos.task: Consider adding task creation functionality to prototype
todos.description: Fully implemented task creation system: + button in Long List header with Lucide icon, keyboard shortcut (+), inline text input with brain-dump mode (Enter saves and keeps input open), ESC/click-outside to close, ADHD-friendly defaults (priority=now, energy=medium, duration=30min), priority-based sorting (now → later → parking), drag-drop completion with sound/animation, and expanded drag-drop target areas (entire column clickable).

todos.task: Explore additional ADHD-friendly features based on user feedback
todos.description: Research and implement more ADHD-specific features as requested

todos.task: Build todo visualization with priority sorting
todos.description: Create a visual interface to display and manage project todos, sorted by priority

todos.task: What happens when clicking on an item?
todos.description: Define and implement click behavior for prototype tasks - implemented full task edit form with auto-save behavior

todos.task: Understand routines & habits - what does it do?
todos.description: Clarify the purpose and functionality of the routines section

todos.task: Add tasteful label to 3/3 focus tasks reached - red number not visible enough
todos.description: Improve visual feedback when focus list limit is reached

todos.task: Tasteful popup when trying to drag 4th focus item?
todos.description: Better UX feedback when attempting to exceed focus list limit - implemented with failure sound + red flash

todos.task: Switch task in focus mode does nothing (useful)
todos.description: Implement actual task switching functionality in focus mode

todos.task: Responsive mode (mobile sizes not covered properly)
todos.description: Make prototype work well on mobile and tablet screen sizes

todos.task: Add task persistence with localStorage
todos.description: Save tasks between sessions using browser localStorage

todos.task: Implement task editing functionality
todos.description: Already implemented - clicking any task opens comprehensive edit form with title, duration (15min-Half day), energy (low/medium/high), and priority (now/later/parking) selection with auto-save functionality. Desktop always edits, mobile edits except for long→focus quick-add behavior.

todos.task: Add subtask breakdown feature
todos.description: Break complex tasks into smaller, manageable steps

todos.task: Implement time tracking functionality
todos.description: Record actual vs estimated time for ADHD learning/calibration

todos.task: Add daily reset feature
todos.description: Clear completed tasks each day with option to archive

todos.task: Implement routine triggers system
todos.description: Automatic task suggestions based on time/context triggers

todos.task: Add export/import functionality
todos.description: Share task lists or backup data as JSON/CSV

todos.task: Add completion sound effects
todos.description: Dopamine-boosting audio feedback for task completion

todos.task: Implement keyboard shortcuts
todos.description: Essential ADHD-friendly shortcuts: Space (complete focused task), Tab (switch between focus tasks), Delete/Backspace (remove focused task), Shift+Enter (add task and close input), Ctrl/Cmd+L (quick focus Long List input), 1/2/3 (jump to focus task 1/2/3), Escape (clear focus/return to overview). Focus on solving real friction points vs cognitive overhead.

todos.task: Add smooth completion animations
todos.description: Visual feedback animations for completed tasks

todos.task: What does break button do? Brainstorm ideas
todos.description: Implemented paused overlay with break options menu: 5-minute timer, breathing exercises (4-7-8), movement suggestions, and brain dump notepad. All options ready for individual implementation.

todos.task: BUG: the blue dotted frame stays on in Long List after dragging a task to Today's Focus
todos.description: Fix drag-over state not clearing properly after successful drop

todos.task: Add failure sound for rejected drag operations
todos.description: Descending error tone when dragging too many tasks or dropping in invalid areas

todos.task: Fix page title and toolbar area
todos.description: Comprehensive header improvements: responsive flexbox layout, logo integration, Lucide icons with tooltips, sound toggle functionality, and stable layout preventing width changes from shifting elements

todos.task: Add visual timer representation for ADHD focus
todos.description: Add visual countdown representation (progress ring, bar, or pie chart) to help ADHD users see remaining time at a glance, complementing the numeric timer
